attributes.action: Tax the fat content in food
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This will make eating healthy more economical, and encourage those on limited income (eg. young people) to make healthy choices.

It will also encourage food producers to make significant reductions in the fat content of their food to avoid being priced out of the market.

I would like to see the revenue generated by this tax being put back into health related programs.
